EmailTemplate.description: New Complaint Message Notification To Complaint Assignment Owners
EmailTemplate.name: New Complaint Message Notification To Complaint Assignment Owners
EmailTemplate.subject: You have a new message for {!Complaints__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New Support Case
California Environmental Protection Agency Environmental Complaint System
New Email Message For {!Complaints__c.Name}
A new email message has been received for {!Complaints__c.Name}. Click here to view the complaint. Thank You, CalEPA Complaint Help Desk
